spec: I will create a calendar component that displays upcoming events from now until midnight, using the provided tool data. The component will render events in a list format, showing the event title along with its start time. The initial state object will include the events and current time, making it easy to filter and display only the relevant events.
description: A calendar component that lists upcoming events until midnight, displaying the title and start time of each event. Events are clickable links that direct users to more details.
